title: C9 TIF - agreement Ball Park loft

abstracts.abstract: An Ordinance Affirming Adoption Of A Redevelopment Plan, Redevelopment Area and Redevelopment Project; Authorizing The Execution Of A Redevelopment Agreement Between The City Of St. Louis And C9 TIF, Inc.; Prescribing The Form And Details Of Each Said Agreement; Designating C9 TIF, Inc. As Developer Of Certain Property Within The Redevelopment Area; Making Certain Findings With Respect Thereto; Authorizing Other Related Actions In Connection With The Redevelopment Of Certain Property Within The Redevelopment Area; And Containing A Severability Clause.
